meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jim Tompkins-MacLaine Alan Israel Hugh McElaney Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1064.

td.p: Jim Tompkins-MacLaine, a musician originally from Tiffin, Ohio
Alan Israel, a coin laundry owner from Redondo Beach, California
Hugh McElaney, a U.S. Air Force contract negotiator from Upton, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,401)

tr.td: STARTS WITH "S"
NEW YORK CITY
BABIES
BRITISH POLITICS
SURVEYS
POTPOURRI
